creator: rajeshclpm@indiatimes.com
text:
I am using Tomcat 2.3.3.  I am trying to create a web page using a multiple 
select listbox.  While I am retreiving the value using JSP it is displaying 
only the first value.  But the same program I tried in JRun and Javawebserver 
it is working fine.  Do I need to change any settings in the Tomcat.  Please 
help immediately.

creator: cmanolache@yahoo.com
text: Not enough data - how do you read params, the form, etc.
